title: Look Around (Anthony Rapp album)
text:
Look Around is the first full-length album by American actor/singer <a href="Anthony%20Rapp">Anthony Rapp</a>, known as a singer for his performance as Mark Cohen in the musical <a href="Rent%20%28musical%29">Rent</a> and the <a href="Rent%20%28film%29">film adaptation</a> of the musical. It was released on October 1, 2000.
About the CD.
Look Around is Anthony Rapp's first CD.
About the Songs.
A few of the songs deal with the death of Rapp's mother including "Always", and "Visits to You".
About the Music Video.
There is a music video of "Out Out Damn Spot". It can be viewed when the CD is put in a computer.
